mapper.update:
update device_borrow_record
equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equipment_name = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrow_user = #{borrowUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrow_date = #{borrowDate,jdbcType=DATE},

return_date = #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
borrow_reason = #{borrowReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrow_num = #{borrowNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update device_borrow_record set equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equipment_name = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrow_user = #{borrowUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrow_date = #{borrowDate,jdbcType=DATE}, borrow_status = #{borrowStatus,jdbcType=OTHER}, dead_line = #{deadLine,jdbcType=DATE}, return_date = #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, borrow_reason = #{borrowReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrow_num = #{borrowNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from device_borrow_record ORDER BY borrow_date DESC limit 0,5
